data.title: August Strindberg's ''A Dream Play'', in
data.meta_description: August Strindberg’s ’’A Dream Play’’, in - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document discusses August Strindberg's play "A Dream Play" in the context of absurdist theatre. It analyzes how the play explores themes of meaningless, suffering, and the absurdity of human existence. Characters are caught in hopeless situations, waiting in vain for change that never comes. The play highlights the meaninglessness of life through its focus on nothingness, suffering, and the futility of waiting.
